price: Kuko iyo babwirwaga ko nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri uretse Allah, baribonaga.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innahum kānū idhā qīla lahum lā ilāha illā al-lahu yastakbirūna
